title: Virtual Assistant/Operations Manager
job_overview:
About Us
The Independent Living Company is a small, Queensland-based property management firm in Australia. We specialise in Specialist Disability Accommodation (SDA) — homes built for Australians living with disability. We’re passionate about creating better living experiences for people who need high-quality, accessible housing.

We’re currently looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant from the Philippines to support our day-to-day admin and marketing tasks.

Job Description
You will work directly with our Australian-based team and help keep our business organised and running smoothly. Your work will include administrative support, marketing coordination, and general task management.

Duties and Responsibilities:
Provide general admin support (data entry, document formatting, file organisation)

Manage our task boards and schedules using Upgrade to see actual info

Assist with property listing updates and basic website content

Use Canva to update templates and design simple marketing materials

Assist with email marketing in HubSpot (we’ll provide training if needed)

Post property updates and content on Facebook and Upgrade to see actual info

Organise files and folders in Google Drive

Perform other administrative tasks as needed

Tools You’ll Be Using:
 Canva
 HubSpot
Upgrade to see actual info
 Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail, Drive)
 Facebook and Upgrade to see actual info (basic posting)

Qualifications:
Excellent written and spoken English is essential
Previous experience as a virtual assistant, admin, or marketing support role
Strong attention to detail and ability to follow instructions
Reliable internet connection and a quiet home working environment
Comfortable using cloud-based platforms and online tools
Bonus: Experience with property, real estate.
